text:
Setter | Software Engineer(s) | Toronto, Canada | ONSITE | https://setter.com

Join the engineering team at one of North America's fastest growing startups! We're revolutionizing a stagnant industry and have the backing from some of the best investors around, including Sequoia Capital and NFX.

We're looking for engineers experienced with various languages & paradigms (currently we use Rust and TypeScript on our back end, and TS+React or TS+ReactNative on our various front-end applications).

Technologies in use in production: - React Native - React / Redux - TypeScript - Rust - PostgreSQL - Docker

We're a fast-moving team that is hard on ideas and not people. We also really like functional programming :)

More info at https://jobs.lever.co/setter

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to our head of people at avery {dot} francis {at} setter {dot} com
